generalDescription.message: The most popular autofill extension, boosting productivity since 2010.

autofillStarsContent.message:
Help spread the word about Lightning Autofill and get 25% off your subscription in the process! It's as easy as 1-2-3...

  1. Mention Lightning Autofill on Facebook, Twitter/X, Reddit, LinkedIn, YouTube, your blog, a forum, or some other social media.
  2. Email us the link to your post.
  3. You will get 25% off your subscription for 12 months (no stacking, but you can re-submit every year).

autofillStarsLinkTT.message: Spread the word and get 25% off your subscription

optionsTabsHotkeyInputTT.message: Press a hotkey combo used to execute this profile

optionsFieldsTypeColTooltip.message: Type of autofill rule or action to execute.

optionsFieldsNameColTooltip.message:
Field identifier to match or element to target.

  • Syntax:
    • pattern – partial text match on supported attributes; if not found, switch to CSS selector match
    • "pattern" – exact text match on supported attributes
    • /pattern/ – regex match on supported attributes
    • //pattern – XPath match
  • Supported attributes:
    • aria-describedby
    • aria-label
    • aria-labelledby
    • autocomplete (except "on" and "off")
    • class (this can match many fields, so use with caution)
    • data-bind
    • data-reactid
    • id
    • name
    • ng-model
    • placeholder
    • src (same-origin iframes only)
    • title
    • value (checkbox/radio inputs only)
  • Text match is case sensitive (use regex i flag to do a case insensitive match).
  • Lines starting with #<space> (comments) are ignored.
  • {@variable_name} and {field ID} variables are supported.

optionsFieldsValueColTooltip.message:
What you enter here depends on the rule type.

  • If Type = Text or Password, enter the text to autofill.
  • If Type = Select, enter the menu item's text/value in double quotes or index number to auto-select. For multi-select listboxes, separate each selection with a pipe (|); enter ! to select all or leave blank to unselect all. Enter ? to select a random item.
  • If Type = Checkbox/Radio, enter 1 to check or 0 to uncheck. Add ! at the end to check/uncheck all items. Enter ? to randomly toggle.
  • If Type = JavaScript, enter JavaScript code to execute. It will be evaluated last (errors are suppressed).
  • If Type = ACTION, refer to field validation message.
  • Text, Password, Select, and Checkbox/Radio rules support all variable types.
  • JavaScript rules only support {@variable_name} variables.

optionsFieldsSiteColTooltip.message:
Document title (<title>) or URL required to trigger autofill.

  • Syntax:
    • pattern – partial text match on document title or URL
    • "pattern" – exact text match on document title or URL
    • /pattern/ – regex match on document title or URL
  • This overrides the profile site filter.
  • Text match is case sensitive (use regex i flag to do a case insensitive match).
  • Lines starting with #<space> (comments) are ignored.
  • {@variable_name} variables are supported.

optionsFieldsModeColTooltip.message:
Form fill method.

  • Safe – fill only empty fields
  • Overwrite – fill all fields, even if non-empty
  • Prepend – insert Value at the beginning of field
  • Append – insert Value at the end of field
  • Wrap – insert Value at the beginning and end of field
  • Increment – add 1 to existing number
  • Decrement – subtract 1 from existing number

optionsFieldsSelectProfile.message: Select a profile to move the highlighted autofill rule to.

optionsAdvancedIntro.message: Global settings can be overridden here. Each line needs to follow this syntax: profile/rule ID: all=true|false delay=<seconds> forcefill=true|false

optionsExceptionsIntro.message: There may be pages you don't want Lightning Autofill activated on. Enter any part of the document title or URL of these pages below, with one entry on each line. This uses the same syntax as the Site field on the Form Fields tab.

optionsVariablesUpgradePro.message: Pro JavaScript variables are only available to Pro members.

optionsGoogleSheetsIntro.message: Once you connect your Google Sheets account, all Lightning Autofill data will be automatically backed up in Google Sheets. This means you'll never have to worry about accidentally losing your data again. You can also manage your data in Google Sheets (click Open in Sheets) and sync changes back to Lightning Autofill (click Sync from Sheets).

optionsGoogleSheetsUpgrade.message: Plus/Pro This feature is only available to Plus and Pro members. Free members can still manually back up and restore in the Import/Export section below.

optionsGoogleSheetsSyncIntro.message:
Lightning Autofill detected an active spreadsheet from a previous cloud sync.

  • Click Sync from Sheets to restore data from the active spreadsheet.
  • Click Sync to Sheets to back up your data to the active spreadsheet.

optionsImportExportIntro.message: Use the Import and Export features below to manually back up and restore your data via CSV files. Select the "Append" import mode to add imported rules after your existing rules; select the "Replace" import mode to replace existing rules with the imported rules.

optionsTextClipsIntro.message: Text clips can be inserted into text fields via the right-click context menu. Follow the syntax in the placeholder below. Separate each text clip with === on its own line. Variables are supported.

optionsTextClipsPlaceholder.message:
Category (optional) > Title
Text to be inserted
===
Category (optional) > Title
Text to be inserted

optionsVariablesIntro.message: Variables can be reused across multiple rules. Text variable syntax: variable_name = some text. JavaScript variable syntax: variable_name = javascript:some code. To use a variable in a rule, enter {@variable_name}.

optionsImportUrl.message: To import data from a remote CSV file, enter the file's URL below. The file must be in plain text format and have the same structure as the exported CSV data. NOTE: To add a recipe, be sure to set the import mode to Append.

optionsOtherSubHelp.message: Enter the invoice number from the welcome email.

optionsOtherAttributesOffHelp.message: Automatically remove these attributes on page load.

optionsOtherAttributesOffInputTT.message: Enter a space-separated list of attributes

optionsOtherActiveProfileHelp.message: Only execute autofill rules in the active profile (override via Advanced / <tt>forcefill</tt>).

optionsOtherDelaySecInputTT.message: Set the number of seconds to wait before autofilling

optionsOtherDelayHelp.message: Add a delay before autofill rules are executed (override via Advanced / <tt>delay</tt>).

optionsOtherRandDelayHelp.message: Add a random offset of ±0.25 seconds to the delay.

optionsOtherBackup.message: Back up text fields larger than

optionsOtherBackupCharsInputTT.message: Set the minimum number of characters to back up

optionsOtherBackupHelp.message: Automatically save text fields in case the browser crashes.

optionsOtherDebugHelp.message: Show debugging messages in the DevTools console.

optionsOtherVarsHelp.message: Replace a<tt> {…} </tt>variable with its output. Click on Help for more info.

optionsOtherManualHelp.message: Execute only when you select a profile in the infobar (override via Advanced / <tt>all</tt>).

optionsOtherOverwriteHelp.message: Set the default form fill method to Overwrite (Form Fields / Mode column).

optionsOtherSiteFiltersHelp.message: Set the site filter policy when generating rules.

optionsOtherSkipHiddenHelp.message: Do not autofill fields that are not visible on the screen.

optionsOtherTurboHelp.message: Speed up autofilling at the cost of stability.

optionsOtherCloseInfobarHelp.message: Automatically close the infobar after the specified operation.

optionsOtherMenuHelp.message: Access Lightning Autofill from the right-click context menu.

optionsOtherDevModePopupHelp.message: Display instructions to enable developer mode for Pro plan.

optionsOtherFilterProfilesHelp.message: Only show profiles that match the site filter in the infobar.

optionsOtherFluidHelp.message: Resize the rules table and text boxes to fill the viewport.

optionsOtherHideBackupHelp.message: Do not show backup profiles in Profiles list.

optionsOtherBadgeHelp.message: Show the number of rules executed on the extension icon.

optionsOtherIETextBoxHelp.message: Use the legacy text box to do the CSV import/export.

optionsOtherReviewHelp.message: Review and confirm changes after import/restore.

optionsOtherSoundHelp.message: Play sound effects after every autofill operation.

optionsOtherThemeBgTT.message: Background color (enter a valid CSS color)

optionsOtherThemeFgTT.message: Foreground color (enter a valid CSS color)

optionsOtherThemeHelp.message: Choose a theme color for the Options page.

optionsOtherTooltipsHelp.message: Show helpful tooltips when you hover over controls (requires reload).

optionsOtherExperimentalNotice.message: The options below grant early access to new features, but they are not guaranteed to be stable.

optionsOtherAutocompleteInputTT.message: Any character can be the trigger, but a symbol or punctuation mark is recommended

optionsOtherCaptchasHelp.message: Pro Automatically solve reCAPTCHA anti-bot challenges.

optionsOtherBiSyncHelp.message: Sync changes from Google Sheets to Lightning Autofill.

optionsOtherParseLabelsAlert.message: CAUTION: This option works well with Google Forms and Microsoft Forms, but for all other forms, enable at your own risk because it may cause Lightning Autofill to generate overly generic autofill rules, potentially resulting in unexpected behavior.

optionsOtherParseLabelsHelp.message: Try to use the label text for Name when generating rules.

confirmProfileDelete.message:
Would you like to delete all rules in the selected profile(s) as well?

Click OK to proceed or Cancel to delete only the profile and move all rules to Unfiled.

promptProfileRenameMany.message:
Rename multiple profiles. Syntax:
- A* = add prefix "A" to the beginning of selected profile names
- *A = add suffix "A" to the end of selected profile names

promptProfileRenameManyError.message: Bulk rename operations require the "*" placeholder.

statusEnableDevMode.message: Please enable "developer mode" as instructed. This is required for the Pro plan.

statusHotkeyDuplicate.message: This hotkey is already assigned to profile "$1". Please try another hotkey combo.

statusProfileCharLimit.message: Profile name cannot be over $1 characters.

statusProfileReserved.message: This profile name cannot be used.

statusLoadError.message: There was a problem loading the data.

statusConnected.message: You have successfully connected to Google Sheets.

statusAlreadyConnected.message: You're currently connected to another Google account ($1). Only one account can be connected at a time – disconnect from that Google account first before connecting to this account. Once you have done this, reload this page and try connecting again. Please contact support if you have trouble connecting.

statusConnectionFailed.message: Connection failed. Please try again in a few minutes, or try connecting to another Google account.

statusConnectionError.message: It seems you did not grant Lightning Autofill permission to access Google Sheets, so cloud sync will not work. To fix this, go to the Sync tab and click Disconnect, then Connect again. On the authorization consent screen, be sure to check the checkbox next to "See, edit, create, and delete only the specific Google Drive files you use with this app".

statusDisconnected.message: You have disconnected from Google Sheets.

statusDisconnectedTooltip.message:
You're disconnected from your Google account.
Connect in Options / Sync to enable cloud sync.

statusDataSyncingFrom.message: Retrieving your data from Google Sheets...

statusDataSyncedFrom.message: Your data has been loaded from Google Sheets.

statusDataSyncFromFailed.message: Failed to retrieve your data from Google Sheets. Error:

statusDataSyncingTo.message: Sending your data to Google Sheets...

statusDataSyncedTo.message: Your data has been saved to Google Sheets.

statusDataSyncToFailed.message: Failed to send your data to Google Sheets. Error:

statusImportFailed.message: Import failed – see Help for correct CSV format.

statusBuildConfirmation.message: Continue to reload Form Fields table?

statusEnterValue.message: Enter a value for the highlighted field.

statusFieldError.message: The highlighted fields don't look right.

statusInvalidRegex.message: Please enter a valid regular expression (regex).

statusPageStillLoading.message: The page is still loading. Please try again in a few seconds.

statusFetchError.message: It looks like your company firewall, internet service provider, or country is blocking access to the Cloudflare server used to verify your subscription. Please connect to a VPN such as Windscribe and try activating again. If you continue to have activation issues, let us know and we'll look into it.

statusReview.message: Review and click Save to commit changes.

statusServer400.message: Oops, something might be wrong with your subscription. Please contact support for assistance.

statusServer500.message: We're experiencing a temporary surge in traffic, causing a slight delay in verifying your subscription. Please reload the Options page in a few minutes, and everything should be back to normal. If the issue persists, please email support@tohodo.com for assistance. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your patience.

statusInvalidInvoiceNo.message: Invalid invoice number. It should look like this: ABCD1234

statusActivationFailed.message: Subscription activation failed. Please email support@tohodo.com for assistance.

validityAUTOFILLvalue.message:
Enter a profile to execute. Example:

c1

validityCLICKname.message: Enter the CSS selector or XPath of the element to click.

validityDISPATCHname.message: Enter the CSS selector or XPath of the element to send events to.

validityDISPATCHvalue.message:
Enter one or more events to send to the target element (Name column). Example:

focus mousedown mouseup

validityOPENvalue.message:
Enter a URL to open, and optional target to open in a new tab. NOTE: If opening in a new tab, be sure to set the Site filter as well to prevent infinite loops. Example:

https://www.somesite.com/ _blank

validityRELOADname.message: Enter the CSS selector or XPath of the element that needs to exist before stopping the reload loop.

validityRELOADvalue.message: Enter the reload interval in seconds (minimum = 1). The page will reload every interval until the target element (Name column) is detected.

validitySCRAPEname.message: Enter the CSS selector or XPath of the element to extract text from.

validitySCRAPEvalue.message: Enter the variable name to store the extracted text in. If the variable is "my_name", then you'll be able to use this variable in subsequent rules by entering {_my_name}.

validityWAITname.message: Enter the CSS selector or XPath of the element that needs to exist before continuing (optional if a delay is entered in the Value column).

validityWAITvalue.message: Enter the delay in seconds (optional unless the Name column is empty). If the target element (Name column) is also entered, then this acts as a timeout when waiting for the target element.

wizardSearchProfilesTT.message: Select a profile to execute all rules in that profile

wizardChooseProfileTT.message: Choose a profile to save rules in

wizardUpgrade.message: You have exceeded the daily profile execution limit. Please upgrade to the Plus or Pro plan for unlimited executions. Subscribe »

wizardUpgradePro.message: JavaScript rules/variables were not processed. Please upgrade to the Pro plan in order to use JavaScript. Subscribe »
